## Page.setIdleOverride() method

Overrides the Idle state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setIdleOverride(isUserActive: boolean, isScreenUnlocked: boolean): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  isUserActive | boolean | Mock isUserActive |
|  isScreenUnlocked | boolean | Mock isScreenUnlocked |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Example


```js
await page.setIdleOverride({isUserActive: true, isScreenUnlocked: false});

```
